description:
A first-year student in the nursing department at the same university as Sakuta. She was Sakuta`s classmate in middle school, and they met again at the university entrance ceremony. She is a diligent and honest honor student, and started a volunteer group at the university to provide academic support to children who are not attending school. She seems to still be worried about Sakuta after he was isolated for speaking out about the existence of Puberty Syndrome in middle schoolâ€¦
Source: Official page
name: Akagi Ikumi
